title: DynameBlackSSK
content:
Help......  
Can anyone tell me where I can get DynameBlackSSK? I used it to make a company logo and lost my computer hard drive - and this font!

Thank You

Jim Lach

 [‹ Serif typeface for a movie promo.](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905085309/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46655 "Go to previous forum topic") [Pixel Font Guru Needed ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905085309/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46654 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Jim Lach

comments.content:
Hi Jim,

DynameBlackSSK is a cheap knock off of Bauhaus Bold, which you can [purchase here](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905085309/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-bauhaus/bold/).

best

Seb
